summary: Regarding the inclusivity... I think it just kinda slaps you in the face, like you’ll be reading it and into it and then you’re...
question: Regarding the inclusivity... I think it just kinda slaps you in the face, like you’ll be reading it and into it and then you’re hit with a visual, that doesn’t resemble you at all and then it’s like a huge buzzing reminder that’s like “WEEEEHOOOOOO !!newsflash!!! They (Hollywood or wtv u wanna call em) doesn’t cast girls like you with guys like him” and it kinda just bumps you out for a second.   Personally I feel like you’re writing is descriptive and enthusiastic enough where it allows (1/2)
answer: And this is why i wanted to start this discussion, thank you for your response, this is what i appreciate in a conversation, constructive criticism. Thank you for explaining it so thoroughly, and for sticking to the point. If I made anyone feel excluded, i am sorry. I don’t want to give excuses, i just want so say i’m sorry.

reblog.comment: And this is why i wanted to start this discussion, thank you for your response, this is what i appreciate in a conversation, constructive criticism. Thank you for explaining it so thoroughly, and for sticking to the point. If I made anyone feel excluded, i am sorry. I don’t want to give excuses, i just want so say i’m sorry.

Thank you for explaining it so thoroughly, and for sticking to the point. If I made anyone feel excluded, i am sorry. I don’t want to give excuses, i just want so say i’m sorry.

Thank you for explaining it so thoroughly, and for sticking to the point. If I made anyone feel excluded, i am sorry. I don’t want to give excuses, i just want so say i’m sorry.

summary:
It's magic, baby - 10 (on Wattpad) https://my.w.tt/Rq7EemuzjV

In a universe where The Avengers are all together and everyone is...
caption: It’s magic, baby - 10 (on Wattpad) https://my.w.tt/Rq7EemuzjV In a universe where The Avengers are all together and everyone is still alive, a new old face comes along. She has created an image for herself and trying to explain who she really is, proves to be quite difficult. Especially when her own brother is Tony Stark. Trying to reshape your image is difficult in the public eye.

summary:
Marvel Studios' Avengers: Endgame - Official Trailer 
The world 
has changed, and none of us can go back.  All we can do is our...
caption:
Marvel Studios’ Avengers: Endgame - Official Trailer

The world has changed, and none of us can go back.

All we can do is our best, and sometimes, the best that we can do, is to start over.

blog.name: thelastdragon6
blog.title: Stark
blog.description:
HERE TO HAVE A GOOD TIME

<a href=“https://thelastdragon6.tumblr.com/post/183831557809/master-list”>Masterlist.</a>

body:
Lost way ch.6

I could feel the breeze in my face while it made my Black long curly hair that was in a ponytail flow. My cap covering the sun from hitting my face. My cup of tea keeping me warm. I could hear the busy streets as I was sitting outside keeping watch for any suspious cars or activity.

“ you guys see that nice Red Range Rover over there. From what I can tell it seems to be bullet proof. You know I keep telling Stark to let me use one of his cars but he doesn’t let me. Shame.” I say through the earpiece while I take a sip of my tea.

“ it being bullet proof means private security, which means more guns which means more headaches for somebody probably us.” Natasha said.

“ it’s definitely us.” I said.

“ you know I can move things with my mind right?” Wanda said.

“ so can I.” I pitched in.

“ looking over your shoulder needs to become second nature.”

“ anybody tell you that you’re a bit paranoid.” Sam said to Natasha. I took another sip of my tea trying to laugh at his comment.

“ not to my face why someone say something?” Natasha answered sarcastically.

“ eyes on target folks it’s the best lead we’ve got in past six months I don’t want to lose him.” Steve said.

After joining the avengers I started talking to them getting to know them. Ive gotten close with all of them. Espically with Steve. Steve and me were closer. A couple months after joining we started talking as more than friends. We had feelings for eachother. And everyone in the compound knew. Especially Natasha. She would constantly tease me about it. Steve and I have been taking things slow. It was adorable him trying. I loved it. Theirs whole side of him I never I thought I’ll see. He always seemed so private about his things and his emotions. But not to me. After we got to know eachother more and more about our feelings towards eachother he became more open. He wouldn’t say everything but he would say enough. He became very protective as well. Something I appreciated sometimes.

-

I climbed on my motorcycle and headed towards the building where the truck had crashed into. I hated not being able to fly in times like these. It would be so much faster if I could. Natasha and I were side by side in our motorcycle. I looked over at her and smiled before going faster. Once I got there I jumped out of the motorcycle letting it hit one of the many armed guys. When they saw me they tried shooting at me. But I duplicated myself tricking them and confusing them. When I was doing that I made them feel enough pain for them to get knocked out. I then saw Nat come by me jumping out of her motorcycle. She attacked them using her fighting skills.

“ one coming towards you.” She huffed as she kicked him my way. I used my telekinesis and sent flying across making him hit a wall and knocking him out. As I was about to turn I felt someone hit me hard on the side of the head. I struggled to get up. The pounding headache now forming. When I got up I heard an explosion that came from a truck. I ran over and saw Natasha on the ground coughing the smoke out. I ran over to her and helped her get up.

“ you okay?” I asked her concerned. She nodded before coughing again. We got on our motorcycles once we saw a truck leave.

“ I got four they’re splitting up.” Sam told us through my earpiece.

“ max and I got the two on the left.” Natasha responded. We jumped off our bikes and jumped on the hood of the cars that blocked our path. We jumped off and ran after the two men. I was running behind Natasha. She made the running easier for me. Because she was clearing the path of any people wondering in between. I was running i felt myself get pushed to the ground. I got up and the guy had the pointing at me. I glared at him with a small smirk playing on lips. He fell onto his knees as he yelled in pain. He dropped the gun to the ground. I ran towards him and then kicked him in the chest making him go across to the far side. I kicked the gun out of the way before going to get him. He was fast though because he got up and smacked across the face.

“ that wasn’t nice at all” I said to him before punching him in the face. He got my arm and flipped me over. He ran towards the gun and pointed it at Natasha. But Natasha was quick and pointer her gun at him. I got up and walked behind. I then made him feel pain which caused him to Knock out.

“ drop it or I’ll drop this.” The other guy said holding the vile. Natasha then pointed her gun at him. But then Sams little robot thing shot him. Making him drop the vile. Natasha ran and caught it.

“ thanks Sam.” Natasha said through the earpiece.

“ yea thanks Sam.” I said as well.

“ don’t thank me.”

“ I’m not thanking that thing.”Natasha said looking at the little robot.

“ yea me neither.”

“ his name is red wing! He’s cute c’mon pet him.” Sam said. I shook my head knowing well that I wasn’t going to thank his redwing. As I was catching my breath. I inmediatly looked up towards the building when I heard the explosion.

-

These past months I’ve been trying to get myself distracted from thinking about my parents killers. The image of their bodies haunt me. I can’t let myself think about who killed them. Because when I do I get mad. At myself and them. At myself because I let myself get tricked into believing Strucker. And when I get mad I want to go find them and kill them all. But I can’t. At least not now.

I was sitting by Steve watching the news on the accident that had happened. What happened was horrible but it was an accident. On our way back home we were all quiet. Espically Wanda she blames herself for what happened. And the news wasn’t nice to her either. I couldn’t hear it anymore so turned the tv off. In the distance I could the voices of another tv on. I put my hand on top of Steve’s and he laced it with mine. His thumb making circles around me knuckles.

“ go to talk to her. I would but you have more experience in this matter.” I quietly said to him.

“ yea I’ll go.” He said quietly before standing up and walking towards her room. I stayed in my chair not wanting to get in the way. Vision then came by me.

“ I thought I should let you know that Mr.Stark has called a meeting he’s brought a guest.” Vision said beside me.

“ thank you for letting me know do you know who it is?” I asked him curiously.

“ the secertary of state.”

.

.

.

“ one coming towards you.” She huffed as she kicked him my way. I used my telekinesis and sent flying across making him hit a wall and knocking him out. As I was about to turn I felt someone hit me hard on the side of the head. I struggled to get up. The pounding headache now forming. When I got up I heard an explosion that came from a truck. I ran over and saw Natasha on the ground coughing the smoke out. I ran over to her and helped her get up.

“ you okay?” I asked her concerned. She nodded before coughing again. We got on our motorcycles once we saw a truck leave.

“ I got four they’re splitting up.” Sam told us through my earpiece.

“ max and I got the two on the left.” Natasha responded. We jumped off our bikes and jumped on the hood of the cars that blocked our path. We jumped off and ran after the two men. I was running behind Natasha. She made the running easier for me. Because she was clearing the path of any people wondering in between. I was running i felt myself get pushed to the ground. I got up and the guy had the pointing at me. I glared at him with a small smirk playing on lips. He fell onto his knees as he yelled in pain. He dropped the gun to the ground. I ran towards him and then kicked him in the chest making him go across to the far side. I kicked the gun out of the way before going to get him. He was fast though because he got up and smacked across the face.

“ that wasn’t nice at all” I said to him before punching him in the face. He got my arm and flipped me over. He ran towards the gun and pointed it at Natasha. But Natasha was quick and pointer her gun at him. I got up and walked behind. I then made him feel pain which caused him to Knock out.

“ drop it or I’ll drop this.” The other guy said holding the vile. Natasha then pointed her gun at him. But then Sams little robot thing shot him. Making him drop the vile. Natasha ran and caught it.

“ thanks Sam.” Natasha said through the earpiece.

“ yea thanks Sam.” I said as well.

“ don’t thank me.”

“ I’m not thanking that thing.”Natasha said looking at the little robot.

“ yea me neither.”

“ his name is red wing! He’s cute c’mon pet him.” Sam said. I shook my head knowing well that I wasn’t going to thank his redwing. As I was catching my breath. I inmediatly looked up towards the building when I heard the explosion.

-

These past months I’ve been trying to get myself distracted from thinking about my parents killers. The image of their bodies haunt me. I can’t let myself think about who killed them. Because when I do I get mad. At myself and them. At myself because I let myself get tricked into believing Strucker. And when I get mad I want to go find them and kill them all. But I can’t. At least not now.

I was sitting by Steve watching the news on the accident that had happened. What happened was horrible but it was an accident. On our way back home we were all quiet. Espically Wanda she blames herself for what happened. And the news wasn’t nice to her either. I couldn’t hear it anymore so turned the tv off. In the distance I could the voices of another tv on. I put my hand on top of Steve’s and he laced it with mine. His thumb making circles around me knuckles.

“ go to talk to her. I would but you have more experience in this matter.” I quietly said to him.

“ yea I’ll go.” He said quietly before standing up and walking towards her room. I stayed in my chair not wanting to get in the way. Vision then came by me.

“ I thought I should let you know that Mr.Stark has called a meeting he’s brought a guest.” Vision said beside me.

“ thank you for letting me know do you know who it is?” I asked him curiously.

“ the secertary of state.”

.

.

.
trail.content:
Lost way ch.6

I could feel the breeze in my face while it made my Black long curly hair that was in a ponytail flow. My cap covering the sun from hitting my face. My cup of tea keeping me warm. I could hear the busy streets as I was sitting outside keeping watch for any suspious cars or activity.

“ you guys see that nice Red Range Rover over there. From what I can tell it seems to be bullet proof. You know I keep telling Stark to let me use one of his cars but he doesn’t let me. Shame.” I say through the earpiece while I take a sip of my tea.

“ it being bullet proof means private security, which means more guns which means more headaches for somebody probably us.” Natasha said.

“ it’s definitely us.” I said.

“ you know I can move things with my mind right?” Wanda said.

“ so can I.” I pitched in.

“ looking over your shoulder needs to become second nature.”

“ anybody tell you that you’re a bit paranoid.” Sam said to Natasha. I took another sip of my tea trying to laugh at his comment.

“ not to my face why someone say something?” Natasha answered sarcastically.

“ eyes on target folks it’s the best lead we’ve got in past six months I don’t want to lose him.” Steve said.

After joining the avengers I started talking to them getting to know them. Ive gotten close with all of them. Espically with Steve. Steve and me were closer. A couple months after joining we started talking as more than friends. We had feelings for eachother. And everyone in the compound knew. Especially Natasha. She would constantly tease me about it. Steve and I have been taking things slow. It was adorable him trying. I loved it. Theirs whole side of him I never I thought I’ll see. He always seemed so private about his things and his emotions. But not to me. After we got to know eachother more and more about our feelings towards eachother he became more open. He wouldn’t say everything but he would say enough. He became very protective as well. Something I appreciated sometimes.

-

I climbed on my motorcycle and headed towards the building where the truck had crashed into. I hated not being able to fly in times like these. It would be so much faster if I could. Natasha and I were side by side in our motorcycle. I looked over at her and smiled before going faster. Once I got there I jumped out of the motorcycle letting it hit one of the many armed guys. When they saw me they tried shooting at me. But I duplicated myself tricking them and confusing them. When I was doing that I made them feel enough pain for them to get knocked out. I then saw Nat come by me jumping out of her motorcycle. She attacked them using her fighting skills.

“ one coming towards you.” She huffed as she kicked him my way. I used my telekinesis and sent flying across making him hit a wall and knocking him out. As I was about to turn I felt someone hit me hard on the side of the head. I struggled to get up. The pounding headache now forming. When I got up I heard an explosion that came from a truck. I ran over and saw Natasha on the ground coughing the smoke out. I ran over to her and helped her get up.

“ you okay?” I asked her concerned. She nodded before coughing again. We got on our motorcycles once we saw a truck leave.

“ I got four they’re splitting up.” Sam told us through my earpiece.

“ max and I got the two on the left.” Natasha responded. We jumped off our bikes and jumped on the hood of the cars that blocked our path. We jumped off and ran after the two men. I was running behind Natasha. She made the running easier for me. Because she was clearing the path of any people wondering in between. I was running i felt myself get pushed to the ground. I got up and the guy had the pointing at me. I glared at him with a small smirk playing on lips. He fell onto his knees as he yelled in pain. He dropped the gun to the ground. I ran towards him and then kicked him in the chest making him go across to the far side. I kicked the gun out of the way before going to get him. He was fast though because he got up and smacked across the face.

“ that wasn’t nice at all” I said to him before punching him in the face. He got my arm and flipped me over. He ran towards the gun and pointed it at Natasha. But Natasha was quick and pointer her gun at him. I got up and walked behind. I then made him feel pain which caused him to Knock out.

“ drop it or I’ll drop this.” The other guy said holding the vile. Natasha then pointed her gun at him. But then Sams little robot thing shot him. Making him drop the vile. Natasha ran and caught it.

“ thanks Sam.” Natasha said through the earpiece.

“ yea thanks Sam.” I said as well.

“ don’t thank me.”

“ I’m not thanking that thing.”Natasha said looking at the little robot.

“ yea me neither.”

“ his name is red wing! He’s cute c’mon pet him.” Sam said. I shook my head knowing well that I wasn’t going to thank his redwing. As I was catching my breath. I inmediatly looked up towards the building when I heard the explosion.

-

These past months I’ve been trying to get myself distracted from thinking about my parents killers. The image of their bodies haunt me. I can’t let myself think about who killed them. Because when I do I get mad. At myself and them. At myself because I let myself get tricked into believing Strucker. And when I get mad I want to go find them and kill them all. But I can’t. At least not now.

I was sitting by Steve watching the news on the accident that had happened. What happened was horrible but it was an accident. On our way back home we were all quiet. Espically Wanda she blames herself for what happened. And the news wasn’t nice to her either. I couldn’t hear it anymore so turned the tv off. In the distance I could the voices of another tv on. I put my hand on top of Steve’s and he laced it with mine. His thumb making circles around me knuckles.

“ go to talk to her. I would but you have more experience in this matter.” I quietly said to him.

“ yea I’ll go.” He said quietly before standing up and walking towards her room. I stayed in my chair not wanting to get in the way. Vision then came by me.

“ I thought I should let you know that Mr.Stark has called a meeting he’s brought a guest.” Vision said beside me.

“ thank you for letting me know do you know who it is?” I asked him curiously.

“ the secertary of state.”

summary: I feel like a lot of people know the song Rubberband man by The Spinners from Infinity War. But if you're one of the few people...
body:
I feel like a lot of people know the song Rubberband man by The Spinners from Infinity War. But if you’re one of the few people who knows it from Suits, ily.

We’re trash either way tbh.

blog.name: phantomofsilence
blog.title: Imagines
blog.description: Hi, I'm Tatia, requests are open!

summary: Hi, Tatia, first of all i love your work.I was wondering what are the tree traits of Steve Rogers you apriciate the most and...
question: Hi, Tatia, first of all i love your work.I was wondering what are the tree traits of Steve Rogers you apriciate the most and relate to?
answer:
I already talked about this. So top 3 are:

Honesty

Steve doesn’t lie and even if he did he sucks. That’s something i relate to, my words might be calm sometimes but my face gives me away. I have ticks when i lie. And i tend not to lie because i think lying is just postponing the inevidable.

Detirmination

I’m stubborn as a mule. If I think something is right consequences are just something that comes with being right. I used to get in trouble in school because i would always point out when something was wrong and i would let any teacher bully anyone because they had a bad day or they were convinced they knew everything so everyone else was stupid. I like to argue, not fight like Steve, but more have an intellectual debate if you will.

Loyalty

Loyalty is the most important aspect of any relationship, if you don’t trust someone, they should be in your life.

Also i’m 5 foot 4 so people i was arguing with, respectfully of course, never lose your manners, were for some reason always taller than me, so u always had to look up.
